ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups rolled oats, 1   +   1/2 cups brown sugar, divided,   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 cups peeled and diced apples, 2 cups peeled and diced pears, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 cup sliced almonds, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 16g 20%, Saturated Fat 8g 39%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 91mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 55g 20%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 34g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 16%, Calcium 58mg 4%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 230mg 5%
